name: Totally Legit Meap Packing Co.
description:
Hello and welcome to TLMP Co!
You have been allocated the position of email sorted for the big man himself. Just remember, our secrets are what makes us so great, so let's keep them to ourselves!

Features:
- Feel like you're completely out of control while being in control!
-

HOW TO PLAY:

1. Tho Boss makes the rules.
2. You need to sort his emails.
3. Forward the ones about any mortuaries.
4. Reply to any others.
5. Delete any spam.
6. Don't run out of time.
7. DON'T GET FIRED!
